name: MIMICRY (itch)
description:
Ever wanted to be a murderous table? Now you can!

MIMICRY should be pretty much what "Hitman" would be like if 47 was the cardboard box from "Metal Gear".

Will the game have nice pixel graphics? Sure. Will the game have nice music? Probably. Will the game have a story? We hope so. Will the game have lots of obscure references and jokes in poor taste? Absolutely!
